page.title: 02HOME LIFE -DOMESTIC PETS
page.content: The first part of our survey was to find out what was the most popular pet. We surveyed 24 families and the most popular animal was the dog. 13 families had dogs. There were 11 families who had no pets at all. There was only 1 family who had a hamster and there were 8 budgies. 2 families had canaries. 7 families had fish. 1 family had a rabbit and 2 families had cats. This is a list of places from where people got their pets. Most people got their pets from the pet shop. 7 people of our survey got their pets from the shop. 5 people got their pets as a present. 6 people got their pets from a friend, 2 from a fair, 2 from a breeder, 1 from India and 1 from the police. {
